question:
Which of the following is equal to \(\left( \begin{array}{cc}\frac{\sqrt{12}}{5}\end{array} \right)\)\(\left( \begin{array}{cc}\frac{\sqrt{60}}{2^4}\end{array} \right)\)\(\left( \begin{array}{cc}\frac{\sqrt{45}}{3^2}\end{array} \right)\) ?
A. \(\frac{1}{12}\)
B. \(\frac{1}{6}\)
C. \(\frac{1}{4}\)
D. \(\frac{1}{3}\)
E. \(\frac{1}{2}\)
Show
Hide
Answer
